description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_ADV_002` |
| **Name** | IF SLEEP Conditional |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_advanced |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details
